name: Family Ties (Carlitos713, Roger Montane Soler, wazyen)
name_original: Family Ties (Carlitos713, Roger Montane Soler, wazyen)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GGJ 2022

You are in the year 1800, in a parallel reality. Redheads god's AURBURN is trying to achieve that by 2050 there will be a perfect person. You will have the responsibility of bringing together men and women to achieve the goals set by the god Aurburn through the different ages. You will have to create children by matching males and females couples in order to acquire the traits that Aurburn wants. But take care because the objectives become more complicated as the years go by and they change! Be careful, because sometimes life is difficult and unexpected events occur that will change the course of your children's lives. 

Play this fun card game now and achieve the goals that Aurburn sends to you!

You can play in the following link

https://tamats.com/games/ggj22/
